post.title: We need your help!
post.description:
Hello Band Nation,
We are growing ever closer to our last 2 fundraisers (Hosting State Band Contes
post.content:
Hello Band Nation,

We are growing ever closer to our last 2 fundraisers (Hosting State Band Contest and Easter Seals -Fill the Truck) on Friday, April 22 and Saturday, April 23 and we truly need your help! We still have a need for over 100 volunteers and 28 bands to serve!!! Please consider helping for a few hours at one of these 2 events. If everyone does a little, no one will have to do a lot! Your bando will be expected to work a session by their band directors, so join the fun! Click on the attached link and sign up today!

State Band Contest Sign Up Genius

Easter Seals Sign Up Genius

Let's make this event a huge success!
